title.rendered: Slow down and enjoy the moment

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Unwind with the newest Esplanade’s stories and events. Find your magical corner to relax and flip through the new summer edition of the Esplanade View glossy magazine.

 

Indulge in topics of interest alongside a dose of the Esplanade’s signature luxury. Find out more about summer in Zagreb, events at the Hotel or get inspired by the classic Esplanade wedding story.  Read the interview with our Josip Ačkar from Zinfandel’s Restaurant or famous artist Marina Mesar Oko.

 

Read the online version or visit the hotel and take a personal copy.

 

Enjoy reading!
Photo credit: Goran Matijašec

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
